doc:
Paul Lieber https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Lieber 0 Paul Lieber is an American stage, television, and film actor. He is best known for playing Eric Dorsey in the television series Barney Miller in 1980.He also appeared in other television series including:
Californication St. Elsewhere Night Court Hill Street Blues Who's the Boss? Cagney Lacey Dallas Barney Miller (1980 TV series) (as Sgt. Dorsey) Saturday Night with Connie Chung (as Abbie Hoffman) Tales from the Crypt Murder, She Wrote Law Order The X-Files Judging Amy Curb Your Enthusiasm NYPD Blue Paul_Lieber is an_American_stage , television , and film_actor . He is_best_known for playing Eric_Dorsey in the_television_series_Barney_Miller in 1980 . He also appeared in other_television_series_including : Californication_St._Elsewhere_Night_Court_Hill_Street_Blues Who 's the_Boss ?
